# RoomBuilder

**Class**

An object that generates a 3D asset from room-capture data.

## Declaration

```swift
class RoomBuilder
```

## Overview

This class processes data from an earlier scan to generate a detailed [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom] object.

Your app receives raw captured room data ([doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoomData]) through:

- The view delegate ([doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/RoomCaptureViewDelegate]) callback [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/RoomCaptureViewDelegate/captureView(shouldPresent:error:)] for an app that provides room-scanning features through the framework-provided view ([doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/RoomCaptureView]).
- The scan session ([doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/RoomCaptureSession]) callback [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/RoomCaptureSessionDelegate/captureSession(_:didEndWith:error:)] for an app that provides room-scanning features by displaying its own view.

Your app generates a detailed captured room object by calling [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/RoomBuilder/capturedRoom(from:)] on the raw data. Your app can then inspect or modify this data before exporting the scanned room to a USDZ file.

## Creating a room builder

- **init(options:)**: Creates a room builder using the specified options.
- **RoomBuilder.ConfigurationOptions**: Options that configure a room builder.

## Processing a prior scan

- **capturedRoom(from:)**: Processes the specified raw scan results and returns a detailed representation of the room.

## Handling errors

- **RoomBuilder.BuildError**: Errors that can occur during captured room-data processing.

## 3D Asset Output

- **Providing custom models for captured rooms and structure exports**: Enhance the look of an exported 3D model by substituting object bounding boxes with detailed 3D renditions.
- **StructureBuilder**: An object that combines multiple scan sessions into a single captured result.
- **CapturedRoom.USDExportOptions**: Options that determine the underlying data format of a scan export.
